modName: Dave The Talking Dragon Companion PET
summary: Dave The Dragon is a dedicated little Dragon Companion. He\'ll be your best friend no matter who you\'re fighting.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: Friendly fire is no longer possible! Imperials, stormcloaks and the college of Winterhold will no longer attack Dave. The command \"Go wait at Whiterun\'s Carriage\" now works properly.

Dave The Dragon is a dedicated little Dragon Companion. He\'ll be your best friend no matter who you\'re fighting.  

 Dave is now FULLY VOICED! He has voiced dialogue and he can follow commands like \"wait\". He can even carry items for you! His walking has also been made slightly less crazy.

Dave can:
-Talk
-Carry items in his inventory
-Wait
-Follow
-Fight
-Breath fire
-And more

DAVE IS COMPATIBLE WITH ALL OTHER PET/COMPANION MODS. 

CAN I HAVE DAVE WITH OTHER COMPANIONS AT THE SAME TIME?: Yes, Dave doesn\'t care if you travel with other companions. He\'ll still stick with you.

HOW TO FIND HIM: Fast travel to or Wait at any location outside a city. 

DAVE IS ESSENTIAL. DON\'T WORRY ABOUT HIM DYING.

DOES HE HAVE ANY QUIRKS?: Sometimes he walks funny, and he likes to eat your enemies\' toes. But other than that, Nope.

Just put it in your data folder and you\'ll meet your new best buddy for life.

If you like Dave, you\'ll enjoy Sam the Talking Skeever just as much! 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9312
author: LawnGnome

files.name: Dave the Dragon 2 OLD
files.changelogHtml:
annoying footstep sounded removed
inability to keep up with player fixed
fire breath added

files.name: Dave the Talking Dragon outdated
files.changelogHtml:
Added voice dialogue
Added ability to wait
Added ability to carry items
Tried to reduce the craziness of his walking

files.name: Dave the Talking Dragon
files.changelogHtml:
Friendly fire problems removed
\"Go wait at Whiterun\'s carriage\"now works properly
Dave will no longer be attacked by the Imperials, Stormcloaks, or the College of Winterhold
